string.name: permission_location_reason
string.value: We need access to your location to offer personalized attendance services, making it easier for you to check in wherever you are.

string.name: permission_network_reason
string.value: To ensure the best service quality, we request permission to monitor your network status. This helps us optimize your experience based on your connection type.

string.name: permission_internet_reason
string.value: Our app requires internet access to deliver up-to-date information and services. Your privacy and security are our priority.

string.name: permission_camera_reason
string.value: Allow camera access so you can use visual features such as scanning QR codes or capturing photos directly within the app.

string.name: permission_microphone_reason
string.value: Grant microphone access to enable voice interaction features, allowing for a hands-free experience when using the app.
